story-context.title: Artifact Management
story-context.summary: Implements comprehensive artifact management system for build outputs, dependencies, and deployment packages. Provides versioning, storage, distribution, and lifecycle management for all build artifacts.

acceptance-criteria.criteria: Store and version build artifacts with metadata
Support multiple storage backends (local, S3, Azure, GCS)
Provide artifact lifecycle management and retention policies
Enable artifact promotion and staging environments
Support artifact dependency management and resolution
Provide artifact security scanning and vulnerability assessment
Implement artifact caching and content delivery optimization
Support artifact replication across multiple regions
